rukus.text: yaqinan hum ne aasmaan mein burj2 banaaye hai aur dekhne walo ke liye ose sajaa diya gaya hai
aur ose har mardoodh shaitaan se mehfooz rakha hai
haan magar jo chori chupe sunne ki koshish kare us ke piche dehekta hoa (khula shola) lagta hai
aur zameen ko hum ne phaila diya hai aur us par (atal) pahaad daal diye hai aur us mein hum ne har cheez ek muayyan meghdaar se ugaadi hai
aur osi mein hum ne tumhari roziya banadi hai aur jinhe tum rozi dene wale nahi ho
aur jitni bhi cheeze hai un sub ke khazaane hamare paas hai aur hum har cheez ko us ke muqarrara andaaz se utaarte hai
aur hum bhejte hai bhujal hawaae phir aasmaan se paani barsa kar wo tumhe pilaate hai aur tum us ka zaqira karne wale nahi ho
hum hee jilaate hai aur maarte hai aur hum hee (bil aaqar) waaris hai
aur tum mein se aage badne wale aur piche hatne wale bhi hamare ilm mein hai
aap ka rab sab logo ko jama karega yaqinan wo badi hikmato wala bade ilm wala hai
